definition: to drag/to tow/to trail/to hang down/to mop (the floor)/to delay/to drag on
flip-flops/flip-flop sandals/thongs/see also 人字拖[ren2 zi4 tuo1]

sentences.english: Wear your favorite pair of open-toe shoes or sandals.
sentences.chinese: 穿你喜歡的露腳趾的涼鞋或拖鞋。

sentences.english: Emily scuffed past in her mother's slippers.
sentences.chinese: 艾米麗趿拉著她母親的拖鞋走過去了。

sentences.english: And the ruby slippers Judy Garland wore in "The Wizard of Oz" movie.
sentences.chinese: 而紅寶石拖鞋穿茱蒂嘉蘭在“綠野仙蹤”的電影。

sentences.english: It saves wear and tear on the carpet.
Heelless slippers were slapping on the stones.
sentences.chinese: 無跟拖鞋在石頭上啪啪作響。

sentences.english: The soles of her slippers were held on by a few stitches.
sentences.chinese: 她拖鞋底快掉了，只有幾根線縫着。

sentences.english: Vendors here sell handmade rugs, clothing and glittering embroidered slippers.
sentences.chinese: 商販們在售賣陶罐，服裝和亮光閃閃的繡花拖鞋。

sentences.english: Young boys in plastic sandals called out in high, hoarse voices, selling skewers of goat meat.
sentences.chinese: 穿着塑料拖鞋的男孩們用粗啞的聲音高聲叫賣羊肉串。

sentences.english: Cook's bedroom slippers were patched and dirty.
sentences.chinese: 廚娘的拖鞋髒兮兮的，補丁也不少。

sentences.english: Unschoolers are hippies, eat granola and sprouts, and wear sandals.
sentences.chinese: 非學校教育者是嬉皮士，喫麥片和新鮮蔬菜，穿拖鞋。

sentences.english: Some time ago she had slippers.
sentences.chinese: 不久前她還有一雙拖鞋可穿。

sentences.english: The puppy chewed a hole in the slipper.
sentences.chinese: 小狗在拖鞋上啃了一個洞。

sentences.english: Into the lean and slipper'd pantaloon!
sentences.chinese: 變成了精瘦的拖着拖鞋的龍鍾老叟。

sentences.english: Flip-flops and slingbacks can also make a car harder to control .
sentences.chinese: 人字拖鞋和露跟女鞋可能讓車更難控制。

sentences.english: His father meted out punishment with a slipper.
sentences.chinese: 他父親用一隻拖鞋進行懲罰。

sentences.english: With its lips the sly fly clipped the slippery slipper that eclipsed his sight.
sentences.chinese: 狡猾的蒼蠅用嘴脣夾住遮擋他視線的滑拖鞋。

definition: flip-flops/abbr. for 人字拖鞋[ren2 zi4 tuo1 xie2]
to wear (one's shoes) like babouche slippers/(onom.) shuffling sound
flip-flops/flip-flop sandals/thongs/see also 人字拖[ren2 zi4 tuo1]
